overview.title: Food Systems & Agriculture Framework
overview.subtitle: Overview
overview.paragraph1: The Food Systems & Agriculture Framework is a comprehensive, adaptable blueprint for transforming global food systems. It integrates regenerative agriculture, Traditional Ecological Knowledge (TEK), and innovative technologies to create sustainable, equitable, and resilient food systems.
overview.paragraph2: This framework reimagines global food systems as regenerative, inclusive ecosystems that nourish both people and planet, with goals to reduce hunger by 50%, achieve 30% regenerative farmland, and empower 5 million farmers by 2035.
